page.title: 18RELIGION IN RUNCTON
page.content: This report refers to the whole of Runcton, not just the area of this survey. Runcton lies within the parish of N Mundham. Practising C of E parishioners have to travel to Mundham to worship as there is no church in Runcton. Of the 500 residents, about 40 could be said to be regular church goers (at least once a month). Of these about 10 attend churches of other denominations. In addition some elderly people attend Communion Services held by the vicar in the old people's home. It is estimated that an additional 35 attend church on 'special occasions' - e.g. Christmas. During the past 5 years 6 children have been baptised, 4 couples married and 18 funeral services held in St. Stephen's Church.
